description: A collection of small patches not worthy of putting in separate mods

flipped-particles-fix.name: Flipped Particles Fix
flipped-particles-fix.description: Fixes some particles not being flipped correctly in reverse gravity

wave-trail-on-death.name: Wave Trail on Death
wave-trail-on-death.description: i added this before we had megahack v8

custom-percent-decimal.name: Custom Percent Decimal
custom-percent-decimal.description: Change the amount of decimal places displayed with decimal percent on

dash-particles-offset-fix.name: Dash Particles Offset Fix
dash-particles-offset-fix.description: Fixes dash orb particles being incorrectly offset

robot-spider-extra-parenting-fix.name: Robot/Spider Extra Parenting Fix
robot-spider-extra-parenting-fix.description: Fixes the "extra" sprite of robot and spider sometimes getting parented to the wrong part of the icon

swing-default-mini-icon-fix.name: Swing Default Mini Icon Fix
swing-default-mini-icon-fix.description: Fixes the swing icon getting replaced by the cube icon when switching to mini on swing with default mini icon on

show-trigger-wave-particles-fix.description: Fixes wave showing ship/ufo fire particles after hiding and showing the icon with hide/show triggers

logarithmic-volume-sliders.description: Puts the volume sliders on a logarithmic scale to more accurately reflect perceived loudness. Also removes the 0.03 volume snap

practice-music-sync-pulse-fix.name: Practice Music Sync Pulse Fix
practice-music-sync-pulse-fix.description: Fixes practice music sync breaking pulsing (RobTop only half-implemented it so this finishes the implementation to make it actually work)

icon-explosion-without-explosion.name: Icon Explosion Without Explosion
icon-explosion-without-explosion.description: Removes any forces from the icon explosion effect so it just falls apart on death

title-windows-only.name: Windows Only
title-windows-only.description: i didnt care enough to implement these on other platforms

optimized-grid.name: Optimized Grid
optimized-grid.description: Optimizes grid rendering and removes grid lines limit
